com.cscguru.client.entities

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.Image
      • org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet
        • com.cscguru.client.entities.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.Renderable

    public class Sprite
extends org.newdawn.slick.SpriteSheet
    Class that adds a little more functionality to the SpriteSheet class that allows the getting of the width and height of an individual sprite on the sheet.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.newdawn.slick.Image

        BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT, FILTER_LINEAR, FILTER_NEAREST, TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(org.newdawn.slick.Image image)
      Initializes the sprite with the image and stores the width and height of an invidual sprite on the sheet.

    • Method Summary

      int getSpriteHeight()

      Returns an individual sprite's width.
